data.message: Doubt you'll see this, I went through a pain pill addiction that nearly killed me and tore apart my family, your music helped saved me. I was in the military so I didn't have options I was suppose to be strong but couldn't beat my demons. When I heard not afraid I broke down and thought if you did it so can I. I've grown into a good man listening to you, I related and you helped save my life. Without ever speaking to you, you helped me in a way I couldn't help myself. I went to prison got clean wasn't ready yet came home and relapsed and listened to not afraid everyday in the beginning of my recovery and now I have 2 years clean, I'm engaged a manager at a job I love and have a fiancée who loves me for me. My family is proud of me again and I just want to say thank you from the bottom of my heart for talking about your addiction and helping me beat mine. I'll be at the Pasadena show in august. I know you say your not a role model but to me you influenced my life when I was partying and influenced my life in recovery. Thanks again. You'll never know what your rhymes met to me.
